pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gauss - Dantzig Selector: Aggregation over Random Models // The method aims to identify important factors in screening experiments by aggregation over random models as studied in Singh and Stufken (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2205.13497. This package provides functions to run the Gauss-Dantzig selector on screening experiments when interactions may be affecting the response. Currently, all functions require each factor to be at two levels coded as +1 and -1.
